sense.def:
To attach something to an object
pomeni tisto združiti ali pritrditi na neki predmet.

To be attached to an organization
pomeni delati za tisto organizacijo, navadno krajši čas.

seg.quote: Hospital officers would be temporarily attached to NHS hospitals.

sense.def:
To attach a quality to something or someone
pomeni domnevati, da ima nekaj ali nekdo tako lastnost.

seg.quote: Don't attach too much importance to what he said.
